channel.title: Arts on Being with Tom
channel.description: Recent content in Arts on Being with Tom

item.title: Body Painting with Lal
item.description: Tom and Lal spend the day body painting!

item.title: Old Art Peices
item.description: Cat by the Window Some Guy Reproduction of Matisse My friend Kasra! Painting Maribel! (my moped, fathful friend to Kasra, Jaime and Cole as well) My friends Matthias and Lilian on mushrooms Portrait of my friend Karl from MSU while on Acid Self Portrait on Acid Followed a Bob Ross Tutorial Guy Debord’s Society of the Spectacle Tribal Gravure! This little thing took weeks to make with my partner Agathe!
